documents.document:
@JGS1888 You’re the Celtic fan Joe, you tell me how much.
Had Armstrong played a major influence in winning both domestic cups and had multiple Scotland caps before he joined you? Let me tell you Joe, no he hadn’t. McGinn is worth more at this stage than Armstrong was.
RT @Fitba_Facts: Stuart Armstrong Age: 26 Celtic Goals 2017/18: 5 Scotland Caps last season: 4 Remaining contract: 1 Year Celtic Valuation:…

@EndsBoth @paulr07 @j_watt11 I’ve never once said what he could be worth you absolute weapon, we are talking about what he’s worth now. Do any of you cunts actually read the whole thread before commenting? Or do you just bump your gums for the sake of it?

@RogicEsque @M_Mitch0408 My point from the very beginning that he’s worth more than 1.5 million. Both sets of fans know that. Yes you would have got more for Armstrong, not arguing that. But if you think McGinn is only worth 1.5 million you are just being unrealistic.

@M_Mitch0408 @RogicEsque Fuckin hell man, have I ever said McGinn is worth 7 million? Read the whole thread before jumping in ya throber. My point is there is not a 5.5 million valuation gap between McGinn and Armstrong. End of.

@RogicEsque And if trophies added to your value Anderson when he was at Man Utd would be worth a fortune. The simple point being made here is that you’ve low balled the fuck out of the McGinn bid, something you give Rangers pelters for.

@paulr07 @j_watt11 What were Armstrong’s major trophy stats before joining Celtic at McGinn’s age if that’s you’re argument?
Also valuation is more about ability, you telling me there is 5.5 million difference? Behave yourself.

RT @j_watt11: Stuart Armstrong in last 12 month's of contract. Celtic value him at 7 million.
John McGinn on last 12 month's of his contr…

Everyone in Scotland scrambling to take a picture on Instagram and let you know how hot it is where they are today. It’s like temperature top trumps.
Lothian buses doubling up as saunas today. Ma chuckies are drowning in arse crack sweat.
If you are in a hurry to get somewhere today, I’d avoid Lothian Buses. 1 hour twenty to get from Tranent to Edinburgh in the boiling heat. Outstanding.

@fezza_safc Like your club, you’re completely irrelevant.
@darrylgalazkax Not on you’re nelly
@fezza_safc You’re a hun as well 😭😭😭

@fezza_safc No, I just hate arguing with thick cunts like you. Kills brain cells. I’ll answer my own question seeing as you’re clearly dodging it. No recent FA Cups, no trips to Europe and a falling attendance. You’re clubs the laughing stock of England. The butt of all the jokes. Jog on.

@fezza_safc You’re clearly a bit thick, honestly couldn’t be arsed with the argument. Won the Scottish Cup while in the championship 2 years ago and got into Europe this season. When did you last win the FA Cup or get into Europe? Still getting sell outs as well aye? Naw, back in your cage.
@darrylgalazkax It’s brutal man, canny get used it at all 😂
@fezza_safc The only thing rising is your hairline big fella.
@darrylgalazkax A lot mare cuts that you’ve got left up top good sir. And no, I was just there for a trim of the bonce and he got ambitious. Fuckin liberty.
Went to the barbers the day and the boy shaped ma beard without even asking. I now look like an Italian waiter who’s gonna flirt with your bird right in front of you.

@fezza_safc Cause being a big club has really helped you from back to back relegations eh? Join a club on the slide or sign for a club on the up. Chance to play in Europe or the chance to play Luton. Aye, Sunderland sounds class like.
How does Firmino no get a game for Brazil by the way? Better than Willian and Jesus in the premiership this season by some way. Made Liverpool tick. https://t.co/lnWAQTMJWn
That cunt in ‘The Staircase’ is 100% guilty, he’s also one of the creepiest guys I’ve ever seen.

Woman - “What happens if some cunt breaks your leg? You canny run as fast if you break your leg”
